entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
